translated: Homage to the Blessed Great Amulet!

original: mo skad cig gis bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: mo skad cig gis bskyed par bya ste /
translated: After meditating on emptiness by the rite taught previously, from a·πÉ arises a yellow pra·πÉ in the center of a moon disk. It emits multicolored light rays that perform the benefit of others and then completely transforms. From that, one should instantly generate the Blessed Great Amulet.

original: ser mo zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: ser mo zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum pa /
translated: She is yellow, with four faces and three eyes.

original: phyag brgyad ma zhal dang po ser po /üîΩg-yas kyi zhal dkar ba /
analyzed: phyag brgyad ma zhal dang po ser po / g-yas kyi zhal dkar ba /
translated: She has eight arms. Her first face is yellow,üîΩher right face is white,

original: nub phyogs kyi zhal sngo ba /
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi zhal sngo ba /
translated: her western face is blue,

original: g-yon rab tu dmar ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon rab tu dmar ba'o //
translated: and her left face is very red.

original: g-yas pa'i phyag g-yas rnams na ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum dang / mda'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag g-yas rnams na ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum dang / mda'o //
translated: In her right hands she holds a sword, a wheel, a trident, and an arrow.

original: g-yon na dgra sta dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje bsnams pa'i phyag go //
analyzed: g-yon na dgra sta dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje bsnams pa'i phyag go //
translated: In the left [hands] he holds an axe, a bow, a noose, and a vajra.

original: sna tshogs kyi padma dang zla ba'i gdan la 'gying bag gis rnam par gnon cing yang dag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi padma dang zla ba'i gdan la 'gying bag gis rnam par gnon cing yang dag par gnas pa'o //
translated: He stands on a multicolored lotus and moon seat, with a haughty pose and perfect bearing.

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po can /
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po can /
translated: He has a red halo.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: He is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
translated: He wears multicolored garments.

original: gos kyi stod g-yogs byas pa /
analyzed: gos kyi stod g-yogs byas pa /
translated: He has an upper garment.

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyi @52b dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyi @52b dbu rgyan can /
translated: He has a crown of various jewels.

original: de ltar rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par bsams la /
translated: Having visualized it in this way,

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams su zla ba la gnas pa'i aom a'a:h'um dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po'i yi ge rnam par bsgom mo //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams su zla ba la gnas pa'i aom a'a:h'um dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po'i yi ge rnam par bsgom mo //
translated: one should visualize the letters O·πÄ, ƒÄ·∏§, and H≈™·πÄ, white, yellow, and blue, on a moon [disc] in the body, speech, and mind [of the deity].

original: de nas nu ma'i bar du zla ba la gnas pa'i pram yig rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: de nas nu ma'i bar du zla ba la gnas pa'i pram yig rnam par bsams la /
translated: Then, one should visualize the letter PRA·πÄ on a moon [disc] between the breasts,

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid la mchod par blta zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid la mchod par blta zhing /
translated: and one should see oneself being worshipped by various goddesses.

original: spro ba dang bsdu bas ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu bas ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate by means of emanation and gathering in as long as one does not become weary.

original: skyo bar gyur na rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sngags mu tig gi phreng ba'i rnam par bltas la bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: skyo bar gyur na rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sngags mu tig gi phreng ba'i rnam par bltas la bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: When one becomes weary, one should look at the mantra in the form of a pearl rosary on the moon at one's heart and do the recitation.üîΩOm mani padme hum.

original: aom ma ni dha ri badzr'i ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni sngags so //
analyzed: aom ma ni dha ri badzr'i ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni sngags so //
translated: Om, O holder of the jewel, O great protector, save me, save me, O jewel!

original: so so 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: so so 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sadhana of Aparajita is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus so//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus so//
translated: It was translated, corrected, and finalized by the pandita Amoghavajra and the translator-monk Chag Drakpa Gyaltsen.
